title: Ipad air screen rotation
message:
hope that someone knows what controls the screen rotation. The image doesn't rotate, it's always in portrait mode. I don't think it is software related problem. 
I have updated and tried everything that I could find on google.

title: Ipad air screen rotation
message:
Thanks. 
What is your thoughts about this? Do you think that replaceing it will fix my problem? 
I havn’t worked on ipads before.

title: Ipad air screen rotation
message: Leave it, don't touch it, it can only get worse. Not worth the risk for such a small defect.
